Plot: What if you witnessed the most significant event in history and no one will believe what you tell them? During NASA's 50th year commemorative "Apollo 11-B; Return to the Moon" space shuttle flight, a horrifying explosion upon lift-off hurls four astronauts of this ill-fated space mission back in time to the 1st century to witness a significant historical event. Upon returning they discover the reason for their mission and the truth of their destiny.
